about_the_game:
‘Motörhead: Through the Ages’ is a wild tour through the mythos of the loudest band in the world! Bring the mighty Snaggletooth back to life with the help of Lemmy and Lloyd Kaufman! Harness the powers of the immortal Motörhead to defeat frightening new enemies in three demon-infested worlds intertwined with the songs of the band.

• Slay your opponents to the rhythm of the band's greatest riffs
• Take the hunt to 3 unique worlds, inspired by Motörhead
• Discover the Monuments of Rock
• New weapon classes - Revolvers and Guitars
• Unleash new Motörhead themed demon powers
• 3 New outfits inspired by Lemmy, Phil and Mikkey
• Clash with Scorpions, Hellhounds and Succubi
• New bosses from the world of Motörhead
• 20 new rock themed destiny cards
• Guest starring legendary director Lloyd Kaufman
• Don't forget to powerslide...
detailed_description:
‘Motörhead: Through the Ages’ is a wild tour through the mythos of the loudest band in the world! Bring the mighty Snaggletooth back to life with the help of Lemmy and Lloyd Kaufman! Harness the powers of the immortal Motörhead to defeat frightening new enemies in three demon-infested worlds intertwined with the songs of the band.

• Slay your opponents to the rhythm of the band's greatest riffs
• Take the hunt to 3 unique worlds, inspired by Motörhead
• Discover the Monuments of Rock
• New weapon classes - Revolvers and Guitars
• Unleash new Motörhead themed demon powers
• 3 New outfits inspired by Lemmy, Phil and Mikkey
• Clash with Scorpions, Hellhounds and Succubi
• New bosses from the world of Motörhead
• 20 new rock themed destiny cards
• Guest starring legendary director Lloyd Kaufman
• Don't forget to powerslide...

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04
  • Processor: 2 GHz Dual Core CPU
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 4.1 (GeForce 600 or higher, AMD Radeon 5000 or higher)
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04
  • Processor: 2.5 GHz Quad Core CPU
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 4.1 (GeForce 660 or higher, AMD Radeon 7000 or higher)
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OSX 10.9 (Mavericks)
  • Processor: 2 GHz Dual Core CPU
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 4.1 (GeForce 600 or higher, AMD Radeon 5000 or higher, Intel HD 4000 or higher)
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: OSX 10.9 (Mavericks)
  • Processor: 2.5 GHz Quad Core CPU
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 4.1 (GeForce 660 or higher, AMD Radeon 7000 or higher)
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows Vista SP2, Windows 7, Windows 8
  • Processor: 2 GHz Dual Core CPU
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 8800 or higher, AMD Radeon HD 4000 or higher, Intel HD 4000 or higher (min. 512 MB VRAM)
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7 (64 bit), Windows 8 (64 bit), Windows 10 (64 bit)
  • Processor: 2.5 GHz Quad Core CPU
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 560 or higher, AMD Radeon HD 5800 or higher
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible
